import React from 'react'; import { List, Header, Button, i, Grid, Icon, Dropdown } from "semantic-ui-react" const sizes = [ { key: 1, text: 'X-small', value: 1}, { key: 2, text: 'Small', value: 2}, { key: 3, text: 'Medium', value: 3}, { key: 4, text: 'Large', value: 4}, { key: 5, text: 'X-Large', value: 5} ] export const Garments = ({ garments }) => { return ( {garments.map(garment => { return(
{garment.colorName}
{Math.round((garment.piecePrice *2))}
) })} ) }
